attributes.action: Bring in tougher penalties for acts such as 'Car-Dooring'
attributes.additional_details: Under current law, if you carelessly open a door and knock a cyclist into the path of a moving vehicle killing them, you can receive an £80 fine. You now get a £200 fine and six points for using your phone whilst driving, so why can you cause death by being careless and practically get away with it?
attributes.background: Motoring laws are a disgrace and the Government needs to change its penalties for offences, families are going without any justice because offences aren't not seen as criminal.
